Text.Page:
Federation solder, eh? Well, listen here—I know soldiers ain't much for being sent on errands, but I could really use a hand here. I have this letter—it's for a friend of mine named Furlan.

I asked one of the messengers to do it, but thing is it's in the Valley of Titans. Not too many willing to head that way these days.

You'll need to get it from Brose first. He was going to take it, but I think fear got the better of him.

Kenan asked you to take the letter? Well, I mean, I really was just about to leave. I just had to, you know, organize the firewood.

If you insist, though, here you go. Have at.

From Kenan? Well, thank you.

Oh. Oh, dear. He wants me and my family to stay with him, where it's safe. It's such a nice thought, but we can't leave our home. We have to stay here and defend it.

Thank you for the note. I'm sorry you made this trip for nothing, but I do appreciate it.
